data.name: Project-Blemmyes
data.detailed_description:
About us

The game is currently developed by two people, one programmer and one designer. So please expect the shortage of game art. The game is currently in development, but we hope to see you as soon as possible!


About the Game



Project Blemmyes is a sci-fi themed roguelite game that combines battle armor, free movement, data simulation and AI mechanical elements.

In the not-too-distant future, a company researching AI technology is conducting an experiment to attempt to store human consciousness in a USB flash drive. As the player you’ve been forced to participate in this bizarre experiment, and through battles... and deaths... are trying to make your escape.

In this third-person shooter, you'll face many different choices: choose your character, build on skills obtained in battle and exploration, plan your journey, and choose your weapons... Choose carefully though, because your fate is in your hands!






  • Randomly generated levels - every battle is a brand new adventure



  • Wide range of weapons - choose the best weapons to deal with different scenarios





  • Skills with unique characteristics - advance and attack, retreat and defend, release at the right time to gain the upper hand!

data.short_description: In this roguelite third-person shooter, control a consciousness inserted into a battle suit forced to defeat endless hordes of enemies as part of an experiment. The ultimate goal is to escape the experiment, but doing so will require determination, skill and countless deaths.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
